metadata.title: More Mannable Systems
metadata.author: kokoro11
metadata.description:
More Mannable Systems 2.0 is here, introducing crew manning skill level progression!
This addon expands your strategic options by allowing crew members to man a wider array of ship systems beyond the standard six systems. Granting direct control over more systems provides unique tactical advantages and enhances your ship's capabilities.
New Feature: Manning Skill Levels This feature requires the "ADVANCED MANNING" option to be enabled. Crew members can now gain experience and level up their proficiency at manning the newly available systems. A crew member's skill level determines the power of the bonus they provide. How to Gain Skill: Crew gain experience simply by manning a system or by being at the station when the system is used during combat. Training Limit: A single crew member can only gain up to 2 skill points for the same system per jump. Exclusions: Crew Drones cannot gain skills.
Manning Bonuses: Bonuses now scale with your crew's manning skills*. - Oxygen: Increases oxygen refill speed by 100/200/300%. - Drones: Increases drone operating speed by 20/30/40% (both crew and space drones). - Artillery: Boosts weapon recharge speed by 10/20/30%. - Temporal*: Reduces system cooldown by 20/33/43%. - Cloaking*: Increases evasion by 40% while cloaking is active. + (Level 1) Also reduces system cooldown by 20%. + (Level 2) Also increases evasion by 10% while system is powered. - Mind Control*: Extends mind control duration by 25%. + (Level 1) Also reduces system cooldown by 50%. + (Level 2) Also causes the mind controlled crew to act twice as fast. - Hacking*: Accelerates hacking speed by 25%. + (Level 1) Also reduces system cooldown by 20%. + (Level 2) Also counters enemy's hacking drone.
*ADVANCED MANNING Game Option: To access the new features, you must enable the "ADVANCED MANNING" option in the main menu. This option unlocks: - The ability to man the Cloaking, Mind Control, Hacking, and Temporal systems. - The entire Manning Skill Level progression and its associated tiered bonuses.
Compatibility: More Mannable Systems is designed for broad compatibility with other Multiverse addons. For a detailed list of compatible addons, please see the dedicated "Compatibility List" Below.
Crucial Installation Note: For seamless functionality, ensure More Mannable Systems is patched LAST after all other addons!
Recommended Patch Order:
1. MV Assets 2. MV Data 3. ... (Other Addons) ... 4. More Mannable Systems
